Class StatusMonitorThread

  • Object
    • StatusMonitorThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class StatusMonitorThread
extends Object
implements Runnable
    This class implements the thread which supports the live feedback of the online status of the S.A.s.
    Author:
    George
